name: Pathompong Sombatpiboon
description: '''Pathompong "Pong" Sombatpiboon''' ({{Langx|th|"โป่ง"; ปฐมพงศ์ สมบัติพิบูลย์}}; born 9 October 1961) is a [[Thai rock]] singer and songwriter. He is the lead vocalist of the bands [[Stone Metal Fire]] and [[The Sun (Thai rock band)|the Sun]]. He has been dubbed the "Thai [[Ozzy Osbourne]]".
